basics.name: Wes Spangler
basics.tagline: Growth & Marketing Leader — scaling healthcare, tech, and operations.

summary: Marketing Advisor and Operations Leader with 8+ years driving growth for healthcare and tech. Proven record aligning marketing to operations, reducing CAC, and delivering multi-state expansion. Expert in CRM automation, paid media strategy, and executive reporting.

items.title: Seed to Series B
items.desc: Led marketing strategy from team-of-one to 12+ staff, supporting 400% revenue growth.

items.title: Multi-State Launch
items.desc: Led GTM strategy for launching 6 new state markets, driving 30% YoY acquisition growth.

items.title: Digital Demand Gen
items.desc: Executed comprehensive digital strategy increasing online patient demand by 40%.

items.title: Paid Media Efficiency
items.desc: Managed 7-figure budget; decreased CPA via attribution, keyword mix, and capacity budgeting.

items.title: YouTube Organic
items.desc: Produced content strategy scaling channel to 100K+ subscribers and 10M+ lifetime views.

items.title: Conversion Rate Opt
items.desc: Increased lead-to-appointment conversion from 20% to 50% through funnel optimization.

items.title: Operations Scale
items.desc: Oversaw daily operations for 12,000+ monthly appointments across 80+ providers.

items.title: Automation Arch
items.desc: Designed ActiveCampaign workflows reducing patient response times by 25%.

items.title: Tech Stack Integration
items.desc: Unified CRM, EHR, and Analytics platforms to create a single source of truth for patient data.

items.title: Global Leadership
items.desc: Managed a cross-functional team of 50+ staff across the US, Philippines, and Jamaica.

items.title: Financial Strategy
items.desc: Partnered with C-suite on P&L management and Series B fundraising materials.

items.title: Cross-Functional Alignment
items.desc: Bridged gaps between Clinical, Product, and Marketing to unify the patient journey.

highlights: Advise healthcare/growth-stage companies on scaling patient acquisition and ops, tailoring playbooks to business models.
Build high-performing teams and implement CRM/automation workflows (ActiveCampaign, HubSpot) aligned with financial goals.
Develop dashboards (CAC, ROI, Funnel) to teach teams how to measure efficiency and make data-driven decisions.
Provide guidance on GTM planning, positioning, and channel mix to diversify acquisition beyond single sources.
experience.summary: Fractional growth partner: implement CRM/automation, own paid media, and install measurement that ties marketing to revenue.

highlights: Oversaw day-to-day operations for 12,000+ monthly appointments across 80+ providers in 6 states and 5 service lines.
Managed a global team of 50+ across the US, Philippines, and Jamaica, creating SOPs and QA protocols.
Reduced no-show rate by 20% and lifted NPS to 70 via process improvements and patient communication optimization.
Implemented workflow automation that reduced administrative workload by 30%, lessening hiring needs.
Produced forecasting reports to align clinical staffing needs with patient volume trends.
experience.summary: Owned multi-state care delivery operations: improved NPS, reduced no-shows, and automated workflows to scale quality.

highlights: Built the marketing function from scratch (first hire) to a team of 12+, driving 400% revenue growth (Seed → Series B).
Managed a 7-figure paid media budget across Search, Social, and OOH with strict CAC targets.
Increased lead conversion rates from 20% → 50% via CRO, local SEO, and lead nurturing workflows.
Led expansion efforts into 4 new markets, driving 30% YoY patient acquisition growth.
Partnered with C-suite on fundraising, developing investor materials and growth dashboards.
experience.summary: First marketing hire. Built the function from scratch and scaled acquisition during rapid multi-state expansion.

highlights: Increased online patient demand by 40% through an integrated digital strategy (Paid + Organic).
Executed an organic YouTube campaign that grew to 10M+ views and 100K+ subscribers.
Managed Google/Social ads driving a 20% lift in appointments while lowering acquisition costs.
Implemented reputation management across 12+ locations, boosting local search rankings.
Organized 5K community events and referral marketing collateral to drive local brand awareness.
experience.summary: Owned site, paid, content, and local SEO to drive measurable patient growth across a multi-location practice.
